review.reviewText: We stayed just one night. It was close to all we needed and it was very clean. The staff was courteous and very helpful. Our room was very quiet and very nice.
review.title: Nice

review.reviewText: The park and fly for this hotel is great the shuttle is quick and the valet has your car ready when you arrive from the airport. The staff and rooms are wonderful we are a family of  4 and we will be back
review.title: Convenient and easy

review.reviewText: As always a Very Friendly Staff and Well Kept Facility
review.title: Very Nice Hotel close to City and Airport

review.reviewText: Some construction work was going on but noisy only between 9 and 5. Nothing within walking distance but shuttle to airport is frequent. Less frequent (hourly) is shuttle to the shops in Burlingame where many good eateries are.
review.title: Convenient shuttle service to and from SFO airport

review.reviewText: Very nice, clean, quiet room for a decent price.

The hotel itself was beautiful with a big central atrium.  Loved being able to take nice long walks right along the water on a walking path. Convenient shuttle bus picks you up in front of the hotel and takes you to downtown Burlingame. A must visit. Great shops and restaurants. Also, free shuttle busses to and from the airport. I would definitely stay here again. Pool needs some new lounge chairs though. Pool is nice.
review.title: Very nice hotel on the water.

review.reviewText: Great service and the staff were very friendly and helpful in every way.  I would recommend to a friend.
review.title: Nice, close to the airport and friendly staff

review.reviewText: Stayed the night and took the BART to the City. We left the car and took a shuttle.
review.title: Clean and staff was so kind.

review.reviewText: Great service and very helpful during our stay. Definitely recommend this hotel.
review.title: Very nice and clean hotel. Great staff!

review.reviewText: All Ok, clean, well maintained, good food, easy parking
review.title: Convenient location - close to the airport

review.reviewText: Close to the airport, timely shuttle service, free wifi. Everything we needed. We arrived late, went to sleep and got the early morning shuttle.
review.title: Great Airport Hotel

review.reviewText: What a nice hotel to stay in just be prepared to pay for parking. I guess a city this size parking is a huge issue. Overall very nice hotel
review.title: From Tijuana

review.reviewText:
El lugar es tranquilo, y la avenida invita a caminar frente al mar. Tiene un buen servicio de Shuttle al aeropuerto. El servicio es bueno, la gente es, en general, amable. 
La comida es buena y suficientemente variada. En las cercanías hay también un par de restaurantes. 
Mi estancia tuvo que ver con conferencias de trabajo, por lo cual y normalmente combinaba las horas de conferencia con trabajo desde mi habitación, lo cual me resultó muy cómodo.
El checkout fue expedito, aunque tuve que pasar por el counter porque el checkout automático desde la habitación no operaba.
En un buen hotel, particularmente para ocasiones de negocios.
review.title: El hotel está cerca del aeropuerto Int. de SFO

review.reviewText: Hotel was not too far from San Francisco main attractions (about 20 minutes). Staff was extremely polite. Nice rooms. Buffet was ok, but overpriced. The air conditioning in the room was not working well. It would turn off.

My wife and I had been staying at the nearby redroof and were not thrilled with its obscure location and overworked staff, and switched to the Hyatt for just $30 more per night.  What a difference!  The Hyatt has actual restaurants and a gorgeous attrium, plus is close to several nice dining venues within walking distance. Everything else is at least two stars above the redroof, which Expedia anomoloisly grades 3.5 stars to the Hyatt's 4.0 stars. the Hyatt airport shuttle is also twice as frequent and dedicated to the Hyatt, in contrast to the redroof shuttle which runs just twice an hour and shares with another hotel.
review.title: Beautiful facilities, attentive staff

review.reviewText: It was great. The hotel is really impressive, and not too far from SF.
Comfortable, near airport has a shuttle but is not terribly expensive.
review.title: Great Airport hotel

review.reviewText: We only stayed one night, to fly out the next day, and paid for the stay and play package which included the parking.  The valet when we pulled up was so friendly and helpful! And then the staff at the registration desk made sure to give us a quiet room because we had an early flight. The room was clean and quiet, with a little balcony overlooking the atrium. The concierge gave us the rundown on restaurants we could walk to, and we really enjoyed our dinner at Max's,and the next morning, the shuttle was right on time, with a friendly driver, and it was all fantastic!  After our flight back, the shuttle was right there, we called the hotel, and our car was waiting for us, and the valet opened our doors for us with smiles and friendliness.  I highly reccommend!!
review.title: Excellent location and super friendly staff

review.reviewText: The computers were down and there was a long line to check in, but the hotel staff handled the situation very well. They served beer to the guests waiting in line, which made my husband very happy. The breakfast buffet was very nice and the wait staff was exceptional. The room was nice and very comfortable. Would stay again!
review.title: Would stay again!

review.reviewText: Beautiful atrium lobby and enjoyable public spaces. Attentive and helpful staff. Lovely room ... beds on the firm side. If you are a light sleeper, ask for a room away from the elevators. All guests were wonderfully quiet, but we were near the elevator gear room, and I could hear the motors whirring all night....
review.title: Great when you have a 5 a.m. SFO departure

review.reviewText: My room wasn't ready upon check-in, so we had to wait about an hour.  The hotel representative was very helpful & gave us free parking for our stay.  I found the customer service to be excellent.
review.title: Great location

review.reviewText: hotel muito bom, proximo ao aeroporto, somente o custo do estacionamento alto.
review.title: muito bom
価格に見合わない古いモーテル
review.reviewText: 部屋の中の匂いが臭く、服に匂いがうつった。通りに面しておりうるさい。スタッフが愛想もな、サービス業の認識がない。
